pr_title: [GEOT-6503] Extend SLD to support background fill specification at the UserStyle level

timeline.author: jodygarnett

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to make the image transparent, before applying your fill, in case the fill has some transparency effects?
timeline.author: jodygarnett

replies.bodyText: No, StreamingRenderer is given a Graphic2D, it should not alter what was done before on it (could have been used for overlay on top of other stuff for example). It should be simple and predictable, just do what it was asked to do (apply the background).
replies.author: aaime
